assets.description: For Jonathan Demme’s documentary, “Man from Plains”, Click3X worked hand-in-hand with the award winning director to create motion graphics and stylized 3D typography integrated into his scenes to help tell the life of our former president, Jimmy Carter.

post_detail.title: Man From Plains
